<h3 id="X22792">X(22792) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EHRMANN-MID TO EXTOUCH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^7-(b+c)*a^6-(3*b^2-8*b*c+3*c^2)*a^5-2*(b+c)*b*c*a^4-2*(b-c)^2*b*c*a^3+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(3*b^2+4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(22792) = 3*X(4)-X(5787) = 3*X(4)+X(6223) = 5*X(4)-X(9799) = 3*X(5)-2*X(6705) = X(84)-3*X(381) = 5*X(3091)-X(12246) = X(3146)+3*X(5658) = 5*X(3843)-X(12684) = 2*X(5450)-3*X(11230) = X(5787)+3*X(6259) = 5*X(5787)-3*X(9799) = X(6223)-3*X(6259) = 5*X(6223)+3*X(9799) = 5*X(6259)+X(9799) = X(7992)-5*X(18492)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(40).</p>
<p>X(22792) lies on these lines:
{4,7}, {5,6692}, {30,6260}, {56,1538}, {84,381}, {153,10914}, {377,10157}, {382,1490}, {388,17622}, {515,1483}, {516,12607}, {517,6256}, {546,6245}, {1158,9956}, {1385,2829}, {1466,9579}, {1478,9856}, {1479,12678}, {1699,3304}, {1709,10895}, {1768,17606}, {1836,13601}, {1898,13273}, {2099,5691}, {2475,5927}, {2478,11227}, {2771,12761}, {3057,12763}, {3091,12246}, {3146,5658}, {3579,18242}, {3583,12680}, {3585,12688}, {3824,6913}, {3843,12684}, {3916,6932}, {4298,7956}, {5044,6850}, {5046,10167}, {5049,10531}, {5084,10156}, {5086,9809}, {5122,6834}, {5253,17618}, {5439,13729}, {5450,11230}, {5499,11231}, {5777,6923}, {5887,16128}, {6001,10107}, {6257,18511}, {6258,18509}, {6929,9940}, {7330,15239}, {7971,18525}, {7992,18492}, {8987,18538}, {9654,12705}, {9780,14646}, {9818,9910}, {9955,12114}, {9957,12115}, {10085,10896}, {10728,21740}, {11681,17613}, {12196,18502}, {12330,18491}, {12456,18495}, {12457,18497}, {12496,18500}, {12616,22798}, {12667,12699}, {12668,18507}, {12675,18527}, {12676,18516}, {12677,18517}, {12686,18542}, {12687,18544}, {13665,19068}, {13785,19067}, {13974,18762}, {18237,18761}, {18245,18520}, {18246,18522}</p>
<p>
X(22792) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 6259}, {382, 1490}, {7971, 18525}, {12667, 12699}, {12668, 18507}<br>
X(22792) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1158, 9956), (1385, 12608), (3579, 18242)<br>
X(22792) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (4, 6223, 5787), (1478, 12679, 9856), (5787, 6259, 6223)<br>
</p>
